entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
